basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Lauren.I am a software developer with a background in project management and IT analysis. I am interested in a role as a software developer because I have gained an expertise in IT project management, writing use cases, and documenting requirements for software with the King County Sheriff.  I have worked hard to complement these skills by learning to code in an accelerated bootcamp and I am excited to continue my career where I help people every day. Something interesting that I just fixed at work is our crime map, which provides statistics on incidents in their neighborhoods, while working closely with our vendor City Protect.

projects.title: Recipe Reservoir
projects.description: A digital space to input and rate recipes, as well as search for user entries based on available ingredients. The project also included a conversion page.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: A voting application to capture user input to guide product devlopment. The application displays user input in a graph after voting is completed.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
